titleStmt.title: The desires and propositions proposed to Sir John Hotham, by the Prince his Highnesse, concerning the town of Hull. With Sir John Hothams answer and resolution nothing derogating from his former constancie. Likewise a most remarkable passage concerning the Palsgravf. Together with the occasion of his Majesties going from Yorke to Newarke upon Trent. Iohn Browne Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Mills, John, 17th cent.
